page_content:
2021 2021 AGNC INVESTMENT CORP . | ESG REPORT1212OVERVIEW
Political Advocacy, Industry Groups,  
Trade Associations, and Policy Research 
Organizations
• Member of 8 housing, financial and legal trade groups, 
including The Association of Corporate Counsel, CRE 
Finance Council, Mortgage Bankers Association, National 
Association of Corporate Directors, Nareit, SIFMA, Society 
for Corporate Governance and the Urban Institute’s Housing 
Finance Innovation Forum.
• We do not use corporate funds for purposes of political 
advocacy, including lobbying or campaign contributions. 
In 2021, we paid membership dues of $230,854 to the 
housing, financial and legal trade associations, and research 
organizations listed above.
